name: RWQFSFASXC Custom Night (Scratch Version)
description:
This is the Scratch version of RWQFSFASXC Custom Night. The Clickteam version will be available as a different "game" later on once I finish porting everything the Scratch version has. While I'm not too proud of the current visuals, there shouldn't be any game-breaking bugs within the game, besides a few layering issues.

This is a non-profit FNaF fangame.

Notes:

This game was made for GameJolt thus has GameJolt integration, just trophies and scores. Logging into GameJolt is not necessary to play the game.

The source code of the game will not contain the GameJolt API as to prevent cheaters from hacking scores and/or achievements onto the leaderboard. Credits: Game Design: Me - Most renders and drawings, main coder

@Pizzalover4783 - Coding assistance, GameJolt API helper

@Gumball_Swivelhands - Gumball's renders, voice-acting Gumball Swivelhands, and Blender help

@LukasStudioTV - Turbowarp GameJolt API
